case.code: routine foo(a:Integer32, b:Integer32) :: a % b echo foo(23, 5)
routine foo(a:Integer32, b:Integer32) :: a % b echo 23, 5 =: foo
routine foo(a:Int32) :: a + 20 routine foo(b:Int32, c:Int32) :: b + c + 55 echo foo := 10 echo foo := 20, 30
routine foo(a:Int32, x:Binary64) :: a + x + 20 routine foo(b:Int32, c:Int32) :: b + c + 55 echo foo := 10, 55.55 echo foo := 20, 30
